name: All the King's Men (3p0ch)
description:
For Brackeys Game Jam 2022.2 with the theme "You're not alone". It's meant to be cute and quirky, so if you get a chuckle out of it when you realize what's going on then mission accomplished.

Credit where credit is due: some sprites I made for the jam but most sprites came from https://o-lobster.itch.io/simple-dungeon-crawler-16x16-pixel-pack and the king's picture from https://kiddolink.itch.io/fantasy-npc-non-playable-characters-pack. I wrote the music a really long time before the jam and this is its premiere in a game. Some SFX were made during the jam and some are from freesound.org. And maybe some other things I'm forgetting but all public domain / CC0.
